attributes.additional_details:
For the Government to give us a referendum on keeping the acts of union 1707 and 1800, as an alternative to the Scottish referendum on Independence.
If we vote no, then the Government should repeal the acts of union 1707 and 1800, but if we vote yes for the Government to have the Union to stay, but for the United Kingdom to become a federal country with a written and codified constitution.
